/downloads.description: Share for NZBGet downloads. Other media Shares can be assigned after installation.
/downloads.label: Download Storage [e.g. nzbget-downloads]

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run NZBGet as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID to run NZBGet as.

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It (or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID to run NZBGet as.

NZBGet.description:
The Ultimate NZB Downloader for Usenet. Web-UI login: after install click 'i' icon for initial username & pass.

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
